New Records: Matthew Wade became the first player in the history of the T20 World Cup to hit three successive sixes in a match
Key Match Events: Aaron Finch fell to his first ball of the night
David Warner was given out for a noise, not a hit, off his bat
Hasan Ali dropped Matthew Wade at deep midwicket
Matthew Wade hit three successive sixes off Shaheen Shah Afridi to end the match
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan's opener Mohammad Rizwan had spent two nights in hospital with a chest infection before declaring himself fully recovered
Australia always thought a target of 177 was achievable on a good wicket
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan will find plenty of positives both in this performance and across the tournament
Babar Azam and Rizwan sit first and second on the list of top scorers
Fakhar Zaman was outstanding in hitting 55 off 32
Miscellaneous Highlights: The T20 World Cup has saved its best until last
Pakistan are unlikely to be underestimated again in the next T20 World Cup
Shaheen Shah Afridi cemented his reputation as the game's most exciting young seamer
